name: spiritdead/resque
description: Redis backed library for creating background jobs and processing them later. Based on resque for Ruby. Inspired by @chrisboulton.

suggest.ext-proctitle: Allows php-resque to rename the title of UNIX processes to show the status of a worker.
suggest.ext-redis: Native PHP extension for Redis connectivity. Credis will automatically utilize when available.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Useful tool for detect the signals of the OS
